1.verse: UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu, ngokommiselo kaThixo uMsindisi wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, iThemba lethu,

2.verse: ubhalela uTimoti, umntwana wakhe kanye ngokwaselukholweni;  uthi, Makube lubabalo, inceba, uxolo, oluvela kuThixo uBawo,  noKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu.

3.verse: Njengoko ndakuyalayo ukuba uhlale e-Efese, ndakuba mna ndisiya kwelaseMakedoni, ndenjenjalo ukukuyala nangoku, ukuze ubathethele abanye, bangafundisi mfundiso yimbi;

4.verse: kananjalo banganyamekeli zintsomi namilibo yakuzalwa engaphele ndawo, izinto ezo ezibanga iimbuzwano, zingahambisi lona ulwakho lukaThixo olungokholo.

5.verse: Ke intsingiselo yoyalo iluthando oluphuma entliziyweni ehlambulukileyo, nasesazeleni esilungileyo, naselukholweni olungahanahanisiyo;

6.verse: abathe abathile, beziphosile ezo nto, baphambukela ekuthetheni okungento yanto;

7.verse: bethanda ukuba ngabafundisi bomthetho, phofu bengaziqiqi izinto abazithethayo, kwanezo bazingqinayo.

8.verse: Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho mhle, ukuba umntu uthi awuphathe ngokomthetho;

9.verse: ngokwazi oku, ukuba umthetho lo awuwiselwe lungisa, uwiselwe ke abachasene nomthetho, nabangenakululama, abangahloneli Thixo, nabangaboni, abangengcwele, nabahlambeli, ababethiyise nababethi-nina, izigwinta,

10.verse: abenzi bombulo, amadoda alalanayo, amasela abantu, amaxoki,  amafunga-buxoki, nokuba kukho nto yimbi ichasene nemfundiso ephilileyo;

11.verse: ngokweendaba ezilungileyo zozuko lukaThixo osikelelekileyo,  endaphathiswa zona mna.

12.verse: Kananjalo ndinombulelo kowandomelezayo, uKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu, kuba wandibalela ekuthini ndithembekile, endimisela ebulungiselelini;

13.verse: nakuba ngaphambili ndandingumnyelisi, nomtshutshisi,  nomphathi kakubi; ndesuka ndenzelwa inceba, ngokuba ndakwenza oko ndingazi, ndisekungakholweni;

14.verse: ke lwanda ngokuncamisileyo ubabalo lweNkosi yethu,  lunokholo nothando olukuKristu Yesu.

15.verse: Lithembekile ilizwi eli, lifanelwe kukwamkelwa konke, eli lokuba uKristu Yesu weza ehlabathini ukuba asindise aboni;  endingomkhulu kubo mna;

16.verse: noko ke ndesuka ndenzelwa inceba ngenxa yoku, ukuze uYesu Kristu akubonakalalisele kum, mna ungomkhulu, konke ukuzeka kade umsindo, ndibe ngumzekelo kwabo baza kukholwa kuye, base ebomini obungunaphakade.

17.verse: Ke kaloku, kuye uKumkani wawo amaphakade, ongenakonakala,  ongenakubonakala, kuThixo olumkileyo yedwa, makubekho imbeko nozuko, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.

18.verse: Olu yalo ndilubeka phambi kwakho, mntwana wam Timoti,  ngokweziprofeto ezandulelayo ngawe, ukuze ulwe ngazo ukulwa okuhle,

19.verse: unokholo nesazela esilungileyo, ethe inxenye, isigibile,  yaphukelwa ngumkhombe mayelana nokholo;

20.verse: inoHimenayo noAlesandire, endabanikelayo kuSathana, ukuze baqeqeshwe ukuba banganyelisi.

1.verse: Ndiyavuselela ngoko kuqala kwiinto zonke, ukuba kwenziwe izikhungo, imithandazo, izibongozo, imibulelo, ngenxa yabantu bonke;

2.verse: ngenxa yookumkani nabo bonke abasekongameni, ukuze sihlale ngokonwaba nangokuzola, sinokuhlonela uThixo, nokundileka konke.

3.verse: Kuba oku kuhle, kwamkelekile emehlweni oMsindisi wethu uThixo;

4.verse: onga yena bangasindiswa bonke abantu, bafikelele ekuyazini inyaniso.

5.verse: Kuba mnye uThixo; mnye nomlamli phakathi koThixo nabantu,  umntu uKristu Yesu,

6.verse: lowo wazinikelayo ukuba abe yintlawulelo yokukhulula abantu bonke; ubungqina ke obo bokungqinwa ngamaxesha angawabo;

7.verse: endithe ndamiselwa bona mna, ukuba ndibe ngumshumayeli nompostile (ndithetha inyaniso ndikuKristu, andixoki),  umfundisi weentlanga elukholweni nasenyanisweni.

8.verse: Ngoko ndinga angathandaza amadoda kuzo zonke iindawo,  ephakamisa izandla ezingcwele, engenangqumbo, engenantandabuzo.

9.verse: Kwangokunjalo mabathi nabafazi banxibe iingubo ezifanelekileyo, beneentloni, benesidima, ingabi kukuphotha iinwele, nokunxitywa kwegolide neeperile, nesambatho esixabiso likhulu;

10.verse: mabathi (ngokufanele abafazi abathi bahlonela uThixo),  bavathe imisebenzi elungileyo.

12.verse: Umfazi ke andimvumeli ukuba afundise, nokuba ayilawule indoda; makazole.

13.verse: Kuba kwabunjwa uAdam kuqala, kwandula ke ukubunjwa uEva.

14.verse: Kanjalo akulukuhlwanga Adam; kulukuhlwe umfazi, waba sekugqitheni.

15.verse: Noko ke wosindiswa ngokuzala, ukuba bathe bema elukholweni,  naseluthandweni, nasebungcwaliseni, benesidima.

1.verse: Lithembekile ilizwi eli lithi, Ukuba ubani ungxamele ubuveleli, unqwenela umsebenzi omhle.

2.verse: Umveleli ngoko umelwe kukuthi abe ngongenakukhalazelwa,  eyindoda yamfazi mnye, eyingcathu, enesidima, ezibekile, ebuka iindwendwe, enokufundisa;

3.verse: engageziswa yiwayini, engembethi, engemngxameli wanzuzo imbi. Makabe ngothantamisayo, engalwi, engemthandi wamali;

4.verse: eyongamele kakuhle eyakhe indlu, abantwana bakhe bemthobele,  benokundileka konke

5.verse: (kuba ukuba umntu akakwazi ukuyongamela eyakhe indlu,  angathini na ukuphatha ibandla likaThixo?);

6.verse: angabi ngosandula ukungeniswa, ukuze angathiwa lwale likratshi, eyele ekugwetyweni koMtyholi.

7.verse: Kanjalo ke umelwe kukuthi abe nobungqina obuhle obuvela kwabangaphandle, ukuze angeyeli engcikivweni nasesibatheni soMtyholi.

8.verse: Kwangokunjalo abalungiseleli bamelwe kukuba nokundileka,  bangabi ntlolela yombini, bangazinikeli kwiwayini eninzi,  bangangxameli nzuzo imbi;

10.verse: Nabo aba ke mabacikidwe ukuqala; bandule ke ukulungiselela,  bengabangenakumangaleleka.

11.verse: Kwangokunjalo abafazi bamelwe kukuba nokundileka, bangabi ngabahlebi; mababe ziingcathu, bathembeke ezintweni zonke.

12.verse: Abalungiseleli mababe ngamadoda abafazi ngabanye,  besongamela kakuhle abantwana nezindlu ezizezabo.

13.verse: Kuba abo balungiselele kakuhle, bazizuzela isimo esihle,  nokungafihlisi okukhulu ekukholweni, okukuKristu Yesu.

14.verse: Ezi zinto ndizibhala kuwe, ndithembe ukuba ndiya kuza kuwe kamsinya.

15.verse: Ukuba ke ndithe ndalibala, ndikubhalela ukuze wazi, ukuba kumelwe kukuthiwani na ukuhanjwa endlwini kaThixo, yona ilibandla likaThixo ophilileyo, intsika nesiseko sayo inyaniso.

16.verse: Kananjalo, ngokuvunyiweyo, inkulu imfihlelo yona leyo yokuhlonela uThixo: lowo wabonakalaliswa esenyameni,  wagwetyelwa esemoyeni, wabonakala kwizithunywa zezulu,  wavakaliswa phakathi kweentlanga, kwakholwa kuye ehlabathini,  wenyuswa waba sebuqaqawulini.

1.verse: Ke kaloku uMoya uthi ngokucacileyo inxenye iya kumka elukholweni, ngamaxesha asemva, inyamekele oomoya abalahlekisayo, neemfundiso zeedemon;

2.verse: imka nohanahaniso lwabathetha ubuxoki, betshiswe isazela sabo ngentsimbi;

3.verse: bengavumi ukuba kuzekwe, nokuba kudliwe izinto ezadalwa nguThixo, ukuze zamkelwe ngombulelo ngabo bakholwayo, bayaziyo inyaniso.

4.verse: Ngokuba sonke isidalwa sikaThixo sihle; asiyonto yakulahlwa,  ukuba samkelwe ngombulelo;

5.verse: kuba singcwaliswa ngalo ilizwi likaThixo nangezibongozo.

6.verse: Ukuba uthe ezi zinto wazibeka phambi kwabazalwana, woba ngumlungiseleli omhle kaYesu Kristu, wondliwe ngamazwi okholo,  nawemfundiso entle oyilandelayo.

7.verse: Ke zona iintsomi ezihlambelayo zamaxhegokazi zimangale.  Ziqhelise ukuhlonela uThixo.

8.verse: Kuba eyeyomzimba ingqeqesho inceda kancinane; ke kona ukuhlonela uThixo kunceda ngako konke, kunedinga lobomi bakalokunje, nobobo buza kubakho.

9.verse: Lithembekile ilizwi elo, lifanelwe kukwamkelwa konke.

10.verse: Kuba sibulalekela, singcikivelwe oko; ngokuba sithembele kuThixo ophilileyo, onguMsindisi wabantu bonke, ngokukodwa owabakholwayo.

12.verse: Makungabikho namnye ubudelayo ubuncinane bakho; suka ube ngumzekelo wabakholwayo ngentetho, ngehambo, ngothando,  ngokholo, ngobunyulu.

13.verse: Nyamekela imfundo, uvuselelo, imfundiso, ndide ndifike.

14.verse: Ungasihilizeli isipho esingokubabalwa, esikuwe;  owasinikwayo ngesiprofeto, kunye nokubekwa izandla yintlanganiso yamadoda amakhulu.

15.verse: Zinyamekele ezo zinto, hlala kwezo zinto, ukuze ukuhambela kwakho phambili kubonakale kwinto yonke.

16.verse: Zilumkele wena nemfundiso yakho; hlala uhleli kwezo zinto;  kuba ngokwenza oko, wozisindisa wena, ubasindise nabo bakuvayo.

1.verse: Indoda enkulu musa ukuyithethisa kabukhali, yiyale njengoyihlo; amancinane, njengabazalwana;

2.verse: abafazi abakhulu, njengoonyoko; abancinane, njengoodade,  unobunyulu bonke.

4.verse: Ke ukuba kukho mhlolokazi uthile unabantwana, nokuba ngabazukulwana, ukuqala mabafunde ukuhlonela elabo ikhaya,  bababuyekezele umbuyekezo ooninakhulu; kuba oko kuhle,  kwamkelekile emehlweni kaThixo.

5.verse: Ke yena ongumhlolokazi ngenene, eshiywe yedwa, uthembela kuThixo; uhlala ehleli ekukhungeni nasemithandazweni ubusuku nemini.

6.verse: Kodwa yena oxhamla iziyolo ufile, nakuba ngathi udla ubomi.

7.verse: Bathethele ezi zinto, ukuze bangabi nakukhalazeleka.

8.verse: Ukuba ke umntu akabakhathalele abakhe, ngokukodwa abendlu yakhe, ulukhanyele ukholo, unobubi ngaphezu kongakholwayo.

9.verse: Makangabalelwa enanini labahlolokazi umhlolokazi ongaphantsi kweminyaka emashumi mathandathu; owayengumfazi wandoda-nye,

10.verse: engqinelwe ngemisebenzi emihle, ukuba wondle abantwana,  ukuba wamkele iindwendwe, ukuba uzihlambile iinyawo zabangcwele, ukuba ubasizile ababandezelweyo, ukuba usukelene nemisebenzi yonke elungileyo.

11.verse: Ke bona abahlolokazi abatsha bamangale; kuba xa bathe badimala nguKristu, bothanda ukwenda;

13.verse: Kunye noko ke bafunda ukungasebenzi nto, bethungelana nezindlu; banganeli kungasebenzi nto kodwa, basuka kananjalo babe ngamapholopholo, bazifake kwizinto zabanye, bathethe izinto ezingafanelekileyo.

14.verse: Ngoko ndinga abahlolokazi abatsha bangenda, bazale, babe ngabanikazi-mizi, bangamniki ochasayo nalinye ithuba lokutshabhisa.

16.verse: Ukuba kukho ikholwa, nokuba likholwakazi, elinabahlolokazi,  malibasize, lize ibandla lingasindwa, ukuze lona lisize abangabahlolokazi ngenene.

17.verse: Amadoda amakhulu, awongamela kakuhle, makabalelwe ekuthini afanelwe yimbeko ephindwe kabini, ngokukodwa lawo abulalekayo elizwini nasemfundisweni.

18.verse: Kuba sitsho isibhalo ukuthi, Uze ungayibophi umlomo inkomo ibhula; nokuthi, Umsebenzi uwufanele umvuzo wakhe.

19.verse: Ukumangalelwa kwendoda enkulu musa ukukwamkela,  kungabangakho mangqina mabini nokuba mathathu.

20.verse: Abo bonayo, bohlwaye emehlweni abantu bonke, ukuze nabanye aba babe nokoyika.

21.verse: Ndiyakuqononondisa emehlweni kaThixo, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, nezithunywa zezulu ezinyuliweyo, ukuba uzigcine ezi zinto ungaqali ugwebe, ungenzi nto ngokwayama bani.

22.verse: Ungangxami ubeke izandla phezu kukabani, kanjalo ungadlelani nabanye ngezono zabo; zigcine nyulu.

23.verse: Musa ukuba sasela manzi; sela intwana yewayini, ngenxa yesisu sakho, nobulwelwe bakho obufuthi.

24.verse: Izono zabanye abantu zisekuhleni kanye, ziyandulela ukuya emgwebeni; abanye ke ziyabalandela nokubalandela.

25.verse: Kwangokunjalo nemisebenzi emihle isekuhleni kanye, naleyo ingenjalo ayinako ukufihlakala.

1.verse: Onke ke amakhoboka aphantsi kwedyokhwe, ndinga ke angababalela abaniniwo ekuthini, bafanelwe yimbeko yonke, ukuze igama likaThixo nemfundiso inganyeliswa.

2.verse: Lawo ke ankosi zikholiweyo, makangazideli ngakuba zingabazalwana; makube kukhona azikhonzayo, ngokuba zingamakholwa, ziziintanda ezingamadlelana ngomsebenzi wokusiza. Bafundise ezi zinto, ubavuselele.

3.verse: Ukuba umntu ufundisa mfundiso yimbi, angavumani namazwi aphilileyo angaweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, nemfundiso engokokuhlonela uThixo:

4.verse: uthiwe lwale likratshi, engazi lutho kakuhle; ufa kukukhanuka iimbuzwano namaphike amazwi, ekuthi kwezo nto kuphume umona, iinkani, izinyeliso, izirhano ezingendawo,

5.verse: iimpikiswano zochuku lwabantu abonakele iingqiqo, abahluthwe inyaniso, beba ukuhlonela uThixo kukusekeleza inzuzo.

6.verse: Ke kona ukuhlonela uThixo, kundawonye nokwanela, kusekeleze inzuzo enkulu.

7.verse: Kuba sibe singangenanga nanto ehlabathini; kuyabonakala kananjalo ukuba asinakuphuma nanto.

8.verse: Sinento ke edliwayo neyambathwayo, masanele zezo zinto.

9.verse: Ke abo banga bangaba zizityebi, beyela ekuhendweni,  nasesibatheni, nasezinkanukweni ezininzi ezibubudenge ezenzakalisayo; zona zibatshonisayo abantu ekonakaleni,  nasekutshabalaleni.

10.verse: Kuba ukuthanda imali yingcambu yeento zonke ezimbi: abathe abathile, ngokuzolulela kuko, balahlekana nokholo, bazibhodloza ngobuhlungu obuninzi.

11.verse: Ke wena, mntu kaThixo, zibaleke ezo zinto; phuthuma ke ubulungisa, ukuhlonela uThixo, ukholo, uthando, unyamezelo,  ubulali.

12.verse: Wuzame umzamo omhle wokholo; bubambe ubomi obungunaphakade,  owabizelwa nokubizelwa kubo, waza waluvuma uvumo oluhle emehlweni amangqina amaninzi.

13.verse: Ndiyakuthethela emehlweni kaThixo, ozidlisa ubomi zonke izinto, nasemehlweni kaKristu Yesu, owangqina wavuma uvumo oluhle phambi koPontiyo Pilato,

14.verse: ukuba uwugcine umthetho lo, ungabi nabala, ungabi nakukhalazelwa, kude kufike ukubonakala kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu,

15.verse: aya kukubonakalisa ngawakhe amaxesha; lowo usikelelekileyo,  ukuphela konamandla, uKumkani kakumkani, uNkosi kankosi;

16.verse: okuphela konokungafi, ehleli ekukhanyeni okungenakusondelwa; ekungekho namnye kubantu owakha wambona,  nonako ukumbona; kuye makubekho imbeko namandla angunaphakade.  Amen.

17.verse: Abazizityebi kweli phakade langoku bathethele bangakratshi,  bangathembeli butyebini bungagqalekiyo; mabathembele kuThixo ophilileyo, obeka phambi kwethu izinto zonke ngokobutyebi,  ukuba zidliwe;

18.verse: benze okulungileyo, babe zizityebi zemisebenzi emihle, babe nokwaba kakuhle, babe nobudlelane;

19.verse: baziqwebele isiseko esihle, base exesheni eliza kuza, ukuze babubambe ubomi obungunaphakade.

20.verse: Wa, Timoti, loo nto uyiphathisiweyo yigcine, uphambuke ezintethweni ezingezizo, ezihlambelayo, nakwiinkcaso zokwazi,  okubizwa njalo kuxokwa;

21.verse: abasuke abathile, bethe banako oku kwazi, baluphosa ukholo.  Ubabalo malube nawe. Amen.
